messages.title: Want to change Britain's Future?
messages.content: The Lib Dems are fighting to get the best for Britain. That means staying in the single market to protect jobs - campaigning for an open and tolerant society. Whilst the other parties don’t want to give you a say, the Liberal Democrats want the public to have the final say on any Brexit deal. This is your one chance to change the direction of our country. Use your vote to change Britain's future.

messages.title: Theresa May's cuts are starving our NHS
messages.content: Conservative cuts to our vital services are going to hurt families. If Theresa May wins big on June 8th then they'll be able to carry on with their cuts agenda. The Lib Dems are the only party with a fully costed plan to give our NHS the support it needs to survive. By raising income tax by just one penny the Lib Dems will give our doctors and nurses £6 billion extra each year to protect our health services. A strong Lib Dem opposition can protect our NHS.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: The Lib Dems will put 1p extra on income tax to deliver an extra £6bn a year to save our NHS.
Lib Dems are fighting to keep Britain in the single market, protect jobs and campaign for an open and tolerant society.

issues.brexitEurope: May is hand in hand with Trump and Farage on Brexit. The Conservatives are now no different to UKIP. Use your vote to change Britain's future. Only the Lib Dems can stop hard Brexit.
issues.government: Liberal Democrats want the public to have the final say on any Brexit deal.
issues.health: Theresa May's cuts are starving our NHS. The Lib Dems are the only party with a fully costed plan to give our NHS the support it needs to survive.

community.content: The Liberal Democrats are fighting to change Britain’s future

endorsements.endorsement: '[Lib Dems are] the anti-Brexit, Remain party. So for all those Remain voters still unreconciled to the outcome of the referendum, they are the obvious choice to go for.'
'Hospital cuts planned in most of England.'
Only the Lib Dems can stop hard Brexit.

quotes.text: 'Theresa May says she will take the UK into the hardest of Brexits.'
'I can hardly believe that the PM is now using the phrases and words that I’ve been mocked for using for years.'

images.caption: Millions are demanding change. Will you join them?
